instructions:
Marinate the fish fillets for at least 1 hour in the Caesar salad dressing. Then place the fillets on a baking
sheet with a rim. Combine crushed chips and cheese, and sprinkle over fillets. Bake in an extremely hot
oven, 500 degrees, for 10 to 15 minutes or until fillets flake easily when tested with a fork. Makes 4
servings.
name: Chipper Perch
